phrases: G- Goku!
No matter how strong Goku- san may be,
if it takes an hour to get through that magnetic storm, he will not last!
Cannot you do something?
I am completely like this.
Huh?
I give up.
l - l'll cut the chain!
Kamehame-Ha!!
Go, Kamehame-Ha!
T- this is the worst!
How is this the worst?
He is a pretty nice-looking man, is not he?
P- please do not go judging people by their faces at a time like this!
But usually, the handsome guy fights for justice.
This is not Earth, it is Planet Namek.
Yeah, I understand that.
Bulma- san, you do not understand anything.
You have managed to mock me pretty good, have not you, Vegeta- san?
I see.
I recall seeing that runt over there holding the Dragon Ball before.
You guys have joined forces, have you?
Yoo-hoo!
Yoo-hoo, yoo-hoo!
Beat up Vegeta!
I do not care about them.
None of that matters.
Vegeta, where have you hidden the remaining Dragon Balls?
You are going to stand before Freeza and tell us.
Try and make me.
You will never learn.
Come on, why do not you transform, already?
What!?
Zarbon, until you change into that hideous form of yours,
you cannot fight toe-to-toe with me.
To someone like myself, who prefers beauty,
those words are the greatest insult!
Vegeta, you have gotten me genuinely angry.
But you can relax.
Freeza ordered me to bring you back alive.
You are too soft, Zarbon.
That softness is what has restored me back to life.
Shut up!
How handsome!
Bulma- san...
Bulma- san, now's our chance!
Let us get out of here!
But he said he would kill us if we ran!
He will kill us even if we do not run!
I will not let you do that!
Damn!
He does not miss a single thing!
Do not you sell me short!
You are prepared to answer for this, yes?
If you are unable to bring Vegeta back here in one hour...
lf this keeps up...
You have finally made up your mind, have you?
H- he is a villain, all right!
W- what was that!?
He turned into a monster!
What is more, his power shot up like mad!
Vegeta, you are the only one who has seen this form twice!
I wonder why it was at the bottom of that lake.
I know!
The villagers might have been in a rush to hide it.
There are two incredible Ki!
They are coming from where Bulma- san is waiting!
Whichever one of them wins, it is bad news for us.
S- Son- kun, hurry and get here!
What are you doing, Goku!?
Stop that!
I are not about... to die here!
Goku, it is no use!
You cannot cut that chain!
G- Goku!
Goku- san!
It is designed so that it will not break when you do that!
Kaio-ken!!
He did it!
He did it!
What a guy!
That was amazing!
Damn... that is 100-times gravity for you...
The bones throughout my body are broken to pieces...
Goku!
Goku!
Goku-san!
Goku-san!
l know...
I cannot die here...
l've got bones broken all over...
Vegeta, just you wait!
Goku- san!
Goku!
Goku!
Do not worry about your face!
Hang in there!
He did it!
He did it!
He did it!
Whew, that was a close one.
A little bit more, and I would have been dead.
But still, I did it.
I experienced 100-times gravity.
At this point, I can go right to training at 100-times.
You fell for it, Zarbon.
Dammit!
You planned that!
Vegeta!
How dare you!
Looks like that hurt pretty bad.
Your strength has dropped quite a bit, has not it?
Zarbon- san, it appears your death is near.
My death is near!?
Do not make me laugh!
My battle power is higher than yours!
Zarbon- san, are not you supposed to be well informed about Saiyans?
Carelessly treating me after I was near death was a bad idea, huh?
Is not that right?
lt's a good thing l brought these Senzu...
l'll have to thank Yajirobe...
Yahoo!
Ups-a-daisy!
All right, I am back to my old self!
Now for some 100-times training-
Before I do, maybe I will go have something to eat.
Saiyans are able to increase their battle power dramatically...
So that is it.
Now that he mentions it, Goku got stronger every time he had a fierce battle.
Damn, so that is the reason why Vegeta's Ki has risen like crazy, huh?
Listen, even if your battle power has risen,
there is still no way you can beat me after I have transformed,
and can exhibit my true power!
The Saiyans are a fighting race!
Do not underestimate us!
V- Vegeta... I was only acting under orders from Freeza- sama...
Let me go... please...
After as much as you have worked me to the bone,
do not you dare go asking for anything for yourself!
I know...
The two of us could team up...
If we did...
If I could defeat Freeza just by teaming up with you,
it would not be very sporting.
Now then...
I do not know how you did it,
but you have raised your battle power a bit since we were on Earth, have not you?
But you are still not at the level where you can fight me on even terms, are you?
What will it be?
Would you be inclined to hand over that Dragon Ball to me nicely?
I- I doubt it will do any good to make any agreements with you,
but if I hand this over, do you promise to leave here without any trouble?
A promise, huh?
Well, all right.
As long as I have the Dragon Ball,
there is no sense in playing around with you, small fry.
Y- you mean it?
What a pest.
If that is how badly you want to live,
then hand it over before I change my mind.
K- Kuririn...
You guys are lucky.
I am in a good mood, since I have now found all of the Dragon Balls.
Now I can attain eternal life,
which will allow me to rule the entire universe, instead of Freeza!
W - we are not about to let Vegeta get all seven of them!
C - come on, Gohan!
At length, six of the Dragon Balls had fallen into Vegeta's hands.
All that remained was the Si Xing Qiu Ball being held by Gohan.
Will Gohan be able to protect it?
